meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the fitting of eyeglasses and contact lenses.
meanings.sent1: The opticists at the store helped me find the perfect pair of glasses.
meanings.sent2: I visited the opticists to get new contact lenses for my eyes.
meanings.sent3: The opticists had a funny way of showing me different frames, making me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in fitting glasses made her stand out among all the opticists.
meanings.sent5: The opticists' expertise in eyewear made them the go-to professionals in town.

meanings.definition: The practice or profession of fitting eyeglasses and contact lenses.
meanings.sent1: Opticists require training to excel in the field of eyewear fitting.
meanings.sent2: The opticists' shop was filled with various frames and lens options.
meanings.sent3: During the busy season, the opticists worked long hours to meet the demand.
meanings.sent4: The art of being an opticist involves both technical skill and customer service.
meanings.sent5: The community recognized the importance of the opticists' role in eye care.
